title: Im sorry Riot.
body: Dear Oceania Riot Team - Due to recent behaviors I've been banned permanently because i said some stuff i shouldn't have. Because of my teamates... they manipulated me into saying things in all chat (via Discord.) and i shouldn't of played with them... I have accepted the thing "in a days span". I love the game but i have a thing with temper so if your having second thoughts permanently mute me i would not care. -Sincerely  ChickZam. (BTW Keep up the great work.)

replies.body:
>Because of my teamates

You are the sole person responsible for your chat; no one else made you type anything.
Not gonna work bud, what you are doing is guilt tripping on a professional company, but good to hear you are reformed, start a new account and donâ€™t make the same mistakes.

Tough luck.

You don't get banned unless you deserve it.
